Name: Allowing consolidation of required reports on building energy efficiency and emissions.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing consolidation of required reports on building energy efficiency and emissions
BodyName: Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts

Summary: Currently, some building owners are required to file with the Department of Buildings energy efficiency reports every 10 years and building emissions reports by May 1 of each year. This bill would allow those building owners to submit both reports as a single consolidated report in the years when the energy efficiency reports are due.
